techmeme.title: Samsung releases One UI 7 beta for Galaxy S24, with a huge visual overhaul, a "Now Bar", a vertically scrolling app drawer, new security and AI tools, and more (Ben Schoon/9to5Google)
Pat Gelsinger was dealt a bad hand by Intel's board, which gave him just three years to execute a turnaround despite challenging timing and circumstances (M.G. Siegler/Spyglass)
Popular NFT project Pudgy Penguins plans to launch a Solana-based token called PENGU within this year, with 23.5% of the 88B tokens reserved for its NFT holders (Shaurya Malwa/CoinDesk)
A Brazilian judge overturns an injunction that would have forced Apple to enable iOS sideloading in 20 days, calling the regulator's decision "disproportionate" (Filipe Espósito/9to5Mac)
The US FCC proposes rules for carriers to submit an annual certification attesting they have a plan to protect against cyberattacks, after the Salt Typhoon hack (Reuters)
